Banner.Description: I have 2+ years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 2+ years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with MVC. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: •Adapted interfaces for modern internet applications using the latest front-end technologies.
•Did complex technical and design decisions for Angular projects.
•Develop application code and unit tests in Angular, Java Technologies, and Rest Web Services.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Developer
Description: • Adapted interfaces for security-focused applications using modern front-end technologies.
• Wrote JavaScript, CSS, and HTML for interactive CTF challenge platforms.
• Developed analysis tasks for reverse engineering and Windows security research.
• Made complex technical decisions for projects involving Angular and security frameworks.
• Developed application code and unit tests in Angular, Java technologies, and RESTful web services with a focus on secure implementations.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: StyleHub
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Salon Slot Booking application made from scratch with firebase auth module, Choice Based Services, Advance Salon Services, and user management. It also has Razor Payment Gateway.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Services
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform belonging to water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Database
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Booking and Login That Are Made In Stylehub Application can view Here. Plans are displayed based on the user's age, monthly income, and location. It has online chat, contact form, notification system by whatsapp and mail, auth, and internet information management through the role of administrator.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Weather Web App
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Real-time weather updates application with OpenWeather API integration, location-based weather, forecast details, and responsive design.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GenAI Web App
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: AI-powered chatbot application built with Google's Generative AI, featuring natural language processing, context-aware responses, and modern UI design.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: LMS Portal
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Learning Management System featuring course management, student progress tracking, content delivery, and assessment tools.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Digital Loan Process App
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Digital loan processing system with document verification, credit scoring, loan tracking, and automated approval workflow.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: HRMS Portal
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Human Resource Management System featuring employee management, attendance tracking, leave management, and performance analytics.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
